Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory793.jpg'}
{3: 'After a grueling six hours of nonstop battles, the trio finally reaches the entrance to the passage Shorthalt spoke of.'}
{3: "Counting the time spent backtracking through debris for supplies, it's been over ten hours since you awoke."}
{3: 'If everything here is under Lithos\' control, how long will it be till his "final shot" finds you?'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lillian', 3: 'Something feels off...', 4: '1'}
{2: "What's wrong?", 3: '11'}
{2: 'Lillian', 3: "Things are going too smoothly. Is this really a base of Lithos'?", 4: '1'}
{1: "Lamia might not have even noticed herself, but she's become a bit more proactive compared to in the beginning."}
{3: "Lamia might not have even noticed herself, but she's become a bit more proactive compared to in the beginning."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "He probably doesn't even care. I've been in the area for almost a month, and it's always been like this.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lillian', 3: "Uh, maybe you're special to him? He clearly wants to kill me, but he hasn't caught up with us yet nor sent any Corrupted to stop us.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lillian', 3: 'Besides, the terrain is really complex here, but we managed to find our destination without much problem.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "That's true. I thought we would've at least spent one whole day searching for the right path, yet we're here already. It's like someone's been guiding us...", 4: '1'}
{2: "It's just the three of us here.", 3: '24'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: 'Ha. Who knows? There can very well be someone else in a place like this. For example, a Lithos clone, or a ghost of his... or one of those big guys up there.', 4: '1'}
{3: "He points upward at the swimming whales that clearly don't belong in the sky."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "There's nothing normal about this place... or that Ascendant. Who in their right mind would decorate their lair with flying whales, right?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lillian', 3: "Perhaps it's the physical manifestation of someone's imagination...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lillian', 3: "The amusement park... and these whales... they're like a fantasy from the M.I.N.D. of a child trapped at the bottom of the deep sea.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She lifts her head and gazes up at the whales swimming in the sky.'}
{2: 'Can an Ascendant really do something like this?', 3: '37'}

{2: 'Lillian', 3: "Ascendants skilled in disrupting others' M.I.N.D.s induce hallucinations using the Punishing Virus. The hallucinations are usually connected to the memories of the corrupted person and the Ascendant themselves.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lillian', 3: 'Sometimes they also use certain special methods... for example, in hospitals and laboratories, there are existing Corrupted with similar capabilities...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lillian', 3: "They'd use those methods to set up a fixed illusion, and all nearby Constructs would be dragged into that illusion after being corrupted.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Lillian', 3: "Designing a massive illusion and inputting it into the mind of a Corrupted requires a lot of effort, though. It's usually much easier to use one's own daydreams as a template.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lillian', 3: "It's just that... the scope of this place seems to be beyond what can be achieved by corruption alone. It's more like the building itself is a Corrupted.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'You seem to know a lot about Ascendants.', 3: '43'}
{2: 'Lillian', 3: "No, no... I simply heard about it, that's all.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lillian', 3: 'It could also be an illusion created by a large number of virtual reality equipment and Corrupted.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "I'm more inclined to believe this explanation. Even during the Golden Age, many themed resorts would use virtual reality equipment as decor.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "Still, if this is really all a projection, it sure feels real. It's like I'm going insane! Plus, this place is ridiculously vast... probably bigger than even an aircraft carrier.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: 'Could that purple-haired midget really have done all this alone?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Maybe there are other Ascendants involved.', 3: '51'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "One of Luna's buddies?", 4: '1'}
{2: "No. According to the intel, these two agents are barely connected. I think it's highly unlikely.", 3: '55'}
{2: 'But Lithos is not the only one working under Vonnegut. "Cthylla" might be here as well.', 3: '56'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shorthalt', 3: 'Makes sense.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Let's keep going. We can start by investigating that door.", 3: '61'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shorthalt', 3: 'Huh? What door? Is there something wrong with your eyes?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Upon closer inspection, you realize that you mistook the side of a fence for a door.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shorthalt', 3: 'Are you all right?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He approaches with concern and grasps your arm with his rough palm. You try your best to hide your fear and disbelief from his scrutinizing gaze.'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: 'Your eyes are bloodshot. How long has it been since you last rested?', 4: '1'}
{2: "I've only just woken up not long ago.", 3: '74'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "This doesn't make sense...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Puzzled, he cradles your face in his hands, yet his soft touch immediately sends a sharp pain shooting through your left cheek.'}
{3: 'The skin he just touched has split open. Blood streams down from the wound and drips onto your chest.'}
{3: 'Shorthalt lets go right away, staring at his hands in disbelief.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3002_03.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '0.8', 5: '1'}
{3: 'You touch your cheek wound tentatively, and a whole piece of skin peels off, landing in your palm.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3002_03.jpg', 3: '0.8', 4: '0', 5: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "Your corruption must be quite severe. The serum shot you got won't last long.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "But it doesn't add up... If the severity of the corruption were due to the high Punishing concentration here, Lillian and I should feel it too.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "But see, as high as the concentration may be, it shouldn't be causing this much damage so soon.", 4: '1'}
{2: "(...Maybe it's the drug that's causing this.)", 3: '93', 4: '(Should I tell them about my abnormal situation?)', 5: '93'}
{2: "(No. They're already treating me as an invalid who needs to be looked after.)", 3: '94'}
{2: '(Telling them would only make them worry more and slow down the whole team.)', 3: '95'}
{2: "I'm fine. Let's focus on the investigation for now. Proper treatment only comes after we get out.", 3: '96'}
{3: 'She extends her hand, but hesitates and looks down.'}
{2: 'Lillian', 3: 'N-nothing. Forget it.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "Let's split up and investigate, then. Lithos had been through three doors in this square, so let's each take one. That should save us some time.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Okay. I'll take the door on the far left.", 3: '105'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lillian', 3: 'Uh, actually, let me take the left one.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The previously timid "Lillian" suddenly blocks the door.'}
{2: "I don't really mind, but... why?", 3: '109'}
{3: "Of course, Lamia can't reveal the truth: she claimed the door on the far left because she sensed a path behind it that's filled with Red Tide."}
{3: 'Neither Constructs nor humans can normally enter such a path. This makes it an excellent spot for Lithos to hide his secrets.'}
{2: 'Lillian', 3: 'I guess I just have this feeling in my gut... like the door might lead to somewhere only someone my size can squeeze through... or something.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shorthalt', 3: 'All right, you go left, then.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'For some reason, this seemingly illogical statement immediately convinces Shorthalt.'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "We gotta trust our gut sometimes, after all. And it's not like the two of us are especially partial toward the left door.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "I'll take the middle. Commandant, you go right. That door doesn't seem very secure, so it's probably less guarded inside. It'd be a better choice for you since you're injured.", 4: '1'}
{3: "He points to the door on the far right, making sure that you won't mistake something else for a door once more."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lillian', 3: "In that case, I'll...", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Lillian', 3: "Wait, I think someone's coming...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shorthalt', 3: 'What? So you had a scouting device on you all along!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lillian', 3: "We'll talk about this later. Hurry and hide!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory795.jpg'}
{3: 'The trio crouch behind the carousel. Soon, you hear combat noises from not far away.'}
{2: 'Fighting in this kind of place... Could there be other survivors?', 3: '134'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "Hard to tell. Let's wait and see.", 4: '18'}
{3: 'A moment after the battle noises cease, light footsteps sound from behind the door on the right.'}
{2: '(Who could it be?)', 3: '139'}
{3: 'You peek out from behind a wooden horse and look toward the cage door...'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'Cleaning... complete. No... anomalies... found.', 4: '1'}
{3: "A monster you've never seen before is uttering human language in an elegant voice, struggling with the syllables as it goes."}
{2: '(Is this what Lithos referred to as "Cthylla\'s child"?)', 3: '145', 4: '(Is this the "Sea Fairy"?)', 5: '145'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shorthalt', 3: '...Darn it. These Hetero-Creatures are becoming increasingly similar to humans.', 4: '18'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Lithos... still refuses... to let us... kill Loki.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'He says... Loki is... protecting. Haha... he just... cannot let her go... even though... he knows that... it does... more harm than good.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: "Not worthy... to be... Mother's child.", 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Finished... four hours later... you... continue cleaning.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "Before you can make a sound, the girl next to you gestures desperately, as if it's taking every ounce of her self-restraint to refrain from reaching out and covering your mouth."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lillian', 3: "No, don't try to get his attention...", 4: '18'}
{2: 'Lillian', 3: "That's not the real Noan... just a copy created by Kurono. His memories have probably been tampered with as well. He definitely won't remember you!", 4: '18'}
{2: 'What? A copy made by Kurono?', 3: '171'}
{2: 'How did you know?', 3: '172'}
{1: '1', 3: "Realizing that she had revealed something she shouldn't have, the girl quickly retreats into the shadows."}
{2: "I'm not blaming you. I just want an explanation, that's all.", 3: '174'}
{2: 'You said they used Simon as a hostage to threaten you to lure out Noan.', 3: '175'}
{2: "And yet now you're telling us that Kurono has copied his M.I.N.D.?", 3: '176'}
{2: 'Lillian', 3: "I'm not sure either... I...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lamia hasn\'t quite grasped the distinction between "Kurono", "Project Winter members," and "defectors" yet.'}
{3: "All she can do is vaguely relay what she's heard from Lillian."}
{2: 'Lillian', 3: "It's just what I heard... They told me that those people wanted to trade with Lithos but were afraid he'd betray them and simply disappear after getting what he wanted...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lillian', 3: 'That was why they had to hand Lithos a clone instead of the real thing... after all, only the original person themselves can be cloned.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'When exactly did this happen...?', 3: '183'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory284.jpg'}
{3: 'Noan is in Babylonia most of the time. The only opportunity someone could have copied his M.I.N.D. would be during an examination.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Could there be members of the Purifying Force lurking within the Science Council?', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{2: "(No, that can't be right...)", 3: '192'}
{1: '1', 3: 'I think Simon once mentioned that, after the Red Tide Influx, Dark Aries was taken away for questioning. Could it have happened then...?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory795.jpg'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "Let's stop worrying for now. We can investigate when we get back.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: 'Our top priority now is to find where Lithos stores the M.I.N.D.s. Only by killing him can we escape.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "Do the terminals you're holding work?", 4: '1'}
{2: "Let's contact each other every half an hour and report our progress and any difficulties we come across."}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "All right. If we don't hear from one of us after half an hour, the rest of us will head in their direction to find them.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "Be especially careful, Commandant. Your wounds haven't healed yet, so please be extra cautious.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shorthalt', 3: "If you get seriously hurt here, we can't carry you out and transform you into a Construct right away. You won't survive.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Caught in the pit of despair, the four and a half people finally meet here. With different feelings in their hearts, they embark on a solitary journey following their own track.'}
